entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with rain changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the Strait. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle early in the morning. Showers beginning in the morning. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
